notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: S.K.S., S.M., M.P., P.L.D.J., N.E.T. and L.M.M., the AMP-AD Consortium, and the CMC Consortium contributed to the design and generation of the study data. S.K.S., T.P., M.C., M.A., J.S.R., G.H., K.D.D., J.C., P.J.E. and J.E. contributed the data analysis. S.K.S., T.P., G.H., A.K.G., L.O., M.P., B.A.L., L.M.M. contributed to the manuscript preparation and data sharing.
